>
[Universal Solvent](/Equipment.aspx?ID=701)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 255 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Originally formulated as a means of dissolving sovereign glue, this powerful solvent can break almost any adhesive's grip. As universal solvent is particularly effective against [sovereign glue](/Equipment.aspx?ID=699), it automatically dissolves sovereign glue. It attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) any other adhesives, such as [_tanglefoot bags_](/Spells.aspx?ID=330), with a counteract modifier depending on the type.
